item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Daidalos is a genius who crafts automatons and strange devices. His engineering skills earned him his place as head of Lykeion. He perfected the winged harness that the soldiers use in battle, which he named after his unfortunate son. He built the Great Maze that protected Asterios during his early years. Daidalos is very good at crafting mechanical men and clockwork horrors.
